extraction_metadata.article_title: Toward Building Specialized Information Systems as Software Platforms

extracted_data.question_text: What is the name and definition of the software business model presented in the article?
extracted_data.extracted_value: Software Platform - A type of software that creates value through a synergy, by surrounding itself with an ecosystem of external connections, data, and processes. The goal of platform thinking is to build a software platform that is a foundation for a new ecosystem.
extracted_data.source_citation: Page 1: 'A software platform is a kind of software that creates value through a synergy, by surrounding itself with an ecosystem of external connections, data, and processes. The goal of platform thinking is to build a software platform that is a foundation for a new ecosystem.'

extracted_value: Combinatorial Innovation → Enables third parties to build on top of platform
Ecosystem Enablers → Surrounds platform with ecosystem of partners and developer tools
Data Democratization → Makes data accessible to third parties through APIs
Platform thinking mindset → Enables business transformation

Common architecture principles → Aligns different teams within organization
Platform team → Responsible for enabling platform business model
Ecosystem of partners and developers → Necessary for platform success
extracted_data.source_citation: Page 4: '1) Combinatorial Innovation: a platform enables combinatorial innovation by allowing third parties to build on top of it. This is done by providing an open and well-documented API that third parties can use to develop their own products and services' | Page 4: '2) Ecosystem Enablers: A platform surrounds itself with an ecosystem of partners, developer tools, and other services that make it easy for third parties to develop products and services that work with the platform' | Page 4: '3) Data Democratization: A platform democratizes access to data by making it easy for third parties to access and use data from the platform' | Page 2: '1) Platform thinking mindset is key to enable the business transformation' | Page 2: '2) The organizational culture needs to be adapted to be able to embrace the platform thinking mindset' | Page 2: '3) A common set of architecture principles is critical to align different teams within the organization' | Page 2: '4) A platform team that is responsible for enabling the platform business model is essential' | Page 2: 'An ecosystem of partners and developers is necessary for the success of the platform'
